meanings: (잔치·시위 등을) (시위 등을) stage, (잔치 등을) throw, give

meanings.meaning: you've made your bed and you must lie in/on it

vlive.korean: 오늘 의상 몇 벌인 줄 알아요? Do you know how many clothes we are wearing? 듣기 View video MONSTA X : [몬채널][B] EP.114 2018 S/S LITMUS
vlive.english: Do you know how many clothes we are wearing?

vlive.korean: [힙합의 상징 골드췌인(?)까지 갖춰벌인 힙합토깽이] - 드레이크에 맞춰서 또 - 그럼요. You tried to match Drake... - Yes. 듣기 View video V PICK! : [NCT] 힙합텐데즈의 키키~ 두유럽미~💚 (NCT’s #InMyFeelingsCHALLENGE)
vlive.english: You tried to match Drake... - Yes.

vlive.korean: [동전지갑이 되어벌인 봉봉이...] 동전들을 잘 모을 수 있겠네요. [It turned into a coin purse...] You can carry a lot of coins in here. 듣기 View video V PICK! : [SEVENTEEN] ~기승전츄케이스~ 막맏의 굿즈관찰기💎🔎(S.coups&DINO’s goods observation)
vlive.english: [It turned into a coin purse...] You can carry a lot of coins in here.

vlive.korean: [그 살아난 댄스본능에 미쳐벌인 사람 나야 나...] 기분이 좋고 그리고 저는 감사해요 솔직히. It makes me happy and I'm honestly really grateful. 듣기 View video V PICK! : [Wanna One] 랩하자, 랩시키면 빼지않는 보컬 황민현처럼 (Wanna One’s first anniversary)
vlive.english: It makes me happy and I'm honestly really grateful.

vlive.korean: [갑자기 유잼자랑되어 벌인(?) 노잼주의보] - 그냥 해요 빨리? - 이거는.. [Suddenly a "Not Fun" warning] - Should I just do it quickly? - This is... 듣기 View video V PICK! : [TEENTOP] 유잼발굴단 틴탑은 노잼을 참지않긔💜 (TEENTOP finding fun)
vlive.english: [Suddenly a "Not Fun" warning] - Should I just do it quickly? - This is...
